title: Create project
description: Parameters required to launch a PyDSS federate

bes_load_mw.description: Load MW from Bulk electric power system lumped load model

bes_load_mvar.description: Load MVAR from bulk electric power system model

der_mw.description: Total distributed energy resourc MW for the transmission load of interest

der_mvar.description: Total distributed energy resourc MVar for the transmission load of interest

source_voltage.description: The message bus type used in HELICS (zeromq ["zmq"] is recommended)

motord_penetration.description: Percentage of Type D motor D penetration

ieee-2018-catI.description: Percentage of IEEE 2018 Category I standard to be included in the distribution models

ieee-2018-catII.description: Percentage of IEEE 2018 Category II standard to be included in the distribution models

ieee-2018-catIII.description: Percentage of IEEE 2018 Category III standard to be included in the distribution models

ieee-2003.description: Percentage of IEEE 2003 standard to be included in the distribution models
